name: RET/CON/NET
description:
RET/CON/NET

HOW TO PLAY:

Connect the DATA SOCKETS to their corresponding OUTLETS to regain lost abilities and escape. Use other robots' perspectives to see colors.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move. Press "E" to interact with DATA SOCKETS and OUTLETS. Press "1", "2", or "3" to switch between perspectives.

CREDITS:

Programming: Daniel Dias

Design/Audio: Rodrigo Mesquita

Art/Modeling: António Canteiro
